description: This file is the entry point for a React.js front-end application. It imports React libraries, CSS styles, and the main App component, then initializes the React DOM root and renders the App component inside a StrictMode wrapper.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root container for rendering React components in the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the root container.
